files.setup.py:
try:
    from setuptools import setup, find_packages
    packages = find_packages()
except ImportError:
    from distutils import setup
    packages = ['%s']

setup(name = '%s',
        version='0.0.1',
        description='',
        long_description=open('README.md','r').read(),
        license='',
        author='',
        author_email='',
        packages=packages,
        install_requires=[],
        )
